frontmatter.title: What Makes The Difference
frontmatter.short: Two friends returned to college for their 25th reunion. They are still very much alike, but there is one big difference between them.
frontmatter.keywords: business intelligence reporting, data driven decision making, data driven decisions, using data to make decisions

mdx.excerpt: Hey: I want to share a story with you from my experience at BYU. It was a memorable lesson for me, and I hope you’ll get something out of it…
